item.title: Claire’s reveals list of 290+ stores it will close
item.description: Claire’s has revealed a list of hundreds of stores it will close as part of its Chapter 11 bankruptcy proceedings.

item.title: Pinellas County issues advisory after West Nile Virus detected in Tarpon Springs
item.description: The Florida Department of Health said positive tests have come from Oldsmar and east Tarpon Springs.

item.title: Armed and dangerous man wanted in Sarasota apprehended in New York state
item.description: Gentis was considered armed and dangerous by authorities who were searching for him.

item.description: Manatee County educators discussed the past, present, and future of education on the Suncoast.

item.title: Manatee County installing new ‘Thor’ lightning prediction system at beaches
item.description: The system works by detecting charges in the atmosphere and in the ground.

item.title: Sarasota commissioners weigh cheaper jail plan that buys only a decade of relief
item.description: The $401 million project would create 725 beds, lifting operational capacity to 1,237 by 2033.

item.title: Hap’s Honda BMX racing team robbed of equipment, community stepping in
item.description: Hap’s Honda BMX Racing team said the community helped them reach their $1,500 goal in 24 hours.

item.title: Waste removal in Sarasota temporarily stopped over the Labor Day Holiday
item.description: No trash, recycling, or yard waste will be collected.

item.title: 5-year-old girl swept into Sarasota storm drain has died
item.description: 'The family is grateful for all the love and support shown over the past few days.' the GoFundMe page said.
